name: Javascript
description: Javascript is a high-level, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions.

name: PHP
description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language geared towards web development. It was originally created by Danish-Canadian programmer Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994.

name: CSS
description: Cascading Style Sheets is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

name: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications. Web browsers receive HTML documents from a web server or from local storage and render them into multimedia web pages.
